name: Native Hawaiian Education
objective: To develop innovative educational programs to assist Native Hawaiians,  to supplement and expand programs and authorities in the area of education, and to encourage the maximum participation of Native Hawaiians in planning and management of Native Hawaiian education programs.
sub_agency_name: Office of Elementary and Secondary Education
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
State (includes District of Columbia, public institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: No Current Data Available. No Current Data Available.

authorizations.text: VI, B, Elementary and Secondary Education Act, as amended.

rules_regulations: Education Department General Administrative Regulations (EDGAR), Parts 74, 75, 77, 79, 80, 81, 82, 85, 86, 97, 98, and 99.
